text: Héctor Eduardo Babenco (February 7, 1946 - July 13, 2016) was an Argentine- born Brazilian movie director, screenwriter, producer and actor.Héctor Babenco at the Internet Movie Database. He worked in several countries including Argentina, Brazil and the United States. His best known movies are Pixote (1980), Kiss of the Spider Woman (1985), Ironweed (1987), At Play in the Fields of the Lord (1990) and Carandiru (2003). Babenco died on July 13, 2016 from a heart attack in São Paulo, Brazil, aged 70.Globo: "Hector Babenco morre aos 70 anos" July 14, 2016 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1946 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Argentine movie directors Category:Argentine movie producers Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Brazilian screenwriters Category:Brazilian movie producers Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian movie directors Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:Writers from São Paulo Category:Actors from São Paulo
